org.cloudgraph.hbase.service

Class HBaseDataConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudgraph.hbase.service.HBaseDataConverter

  • public class HBaseDataConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    HBase specific data converter, delegates to DataConverter under certain conditions.

    0.5
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond

    • Method Detail

      • fromBytes

        public java.lang.Object fromBytes(commonj.sdo.Property targetProperty,
                         byte[] value)
        Converts the given value from bytes based on data type and cardinality information for the given property. For 'many' or multi-valued properties, if the SDO Java type for the property is not already String, the value is first converted from a String using the SDO conversion which uses java.util.Arrays formatting, resulting in an array of primitive types. For non 'many' or singular properties, only the HBase Bytes utility is used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given property is not a data type property
        Parameters:
        targetProperty - the property
        value - the bytes value
        Returns:
        the converted object

      • toBytes

        public byte[] toBytes(commonj.sdo.Property sourceProperty,
             java.lang.Object value)
        Converts the given value to bytes based on data type and cardinality information for the given property. For 'many' or multi-valued properties, if the SDO Java type for the property is not already String, the value is first converted to String using the SDO conversion which uses java.util.Arrays formatting. For non 'many' or singular properties, only the HBase Bytes utility is used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given property is not a data type property
        Parameters:
        sourceProperty - the source property
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the bytes
